classes.name: Boat
classes.description: The main entry point for any instance of this bot.

params.name: options
params.description: the options to run the bot with

props.name: client
props.description: The discord.js API / Websocket client.

props.name: owners
props.description: The owners of the bot

props.name: prefix
props.description: The prefix used for standard message commands

props.name: events
props.description: The events that this client will handle

props.name: rafts
props.description: The sub modules that this boat handles

props.name: commands
props.description: The text based commands that can be called, and their associated raft

props.name: token
props.description: The token used to connect to discord

methods.name: boot
methods.description: Connect the boat to discord and register events

methods.name: launchRaft
methods.description: Register a raft tpo this boat

methods.name: setCommands
methods.description: Associate all commands from their rafts

methods.name: attach
methods.description: Attach the event listeners to the socket.

params.name: event
params.description: the name of the event to listen for

params.name: listener
params.description: the function to call on event

classes.name: CommandInteraction
classes.description: Represents a command interaction, see {@link InteractionClient}.

props.name: id
props.description: The ID of this interaction.

props.name: token
props.description: The token of this interaction.

props.name: commandID
props.description: The ID of the invoked command.

props.name: commandName
props.description: The name of the invoked command.

props.name: options
props.description: The options passed to the command.

props.name: channel
props.description: The channel this interaction was sent in.

props.name: user
props.description: If this interaction was sent in a DM, the user which sent it.

props.name: guild
props.description: The guild this interaction was sent in, if any.

props.name: member
props.description: If this interaction was sent in a guild, the member which sent it.

props.name: createdTimestamp
props.description: The timestamp the interaction was created at.

props.name: createdAt
props.description: The time the interaction was created at.

classes.name: BaseCommand
classes.description: Represents a standard text command that can be run

props.name: boat
props.description: The boat that handles this commands raft

props.name: raft
props.description: The raft that handles this command

props.name: name
props.description: The name of this command

props.name: enabled
props.description: Whether this command is currently enabled

props.name: owner
props.description: Whether this command is owners only

params.name: message
params.description: the message that executed the command

params.name: args
params.description: the content of the message split on spaces excluding the command name

classes.name: BaseRaft
classes.description: Represents a raft that handles one function

props.name: boat
props.description: The boat that handles this raft

props.name: active
props.description: Whether this raft is currently active

props.name: token
props.description: the token to use for login

props.name: clientOpts
props.description: the options to pass to djs

props.name: owners
props.description: the owners of the bot

props.name: commandPrefix
props.description: the prefix used for standard message commands
